attributes.imdb: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0806252/'''Michael Slovis''' is an American director and cinematographer for film and television. He is best known for his work on ''Law and Order: SVU'', ''Elementary'', ''Chicago Fire'', ''CSI'', and was the cinematographer for ''Breaking Bad''. He also previously directed Nikolaj Coster-Waldau's 2008 TV series ''New Amsterdam''.On July 2, 2014, it was announced that Slovis will be directing two episodes in the Season 5
